titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2676) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restructure and reform the Internal Revenue Service, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-602, by Mr. Dreier.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2676. Waives all points of order against the conference report and against its consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 217.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/24/1998--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2676 (amending the Internal Revenue Code to restructure and revise the Internal Revenue Service).
